metadata.Title: CVE-2015-3627 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Libcontainer and Docker Engine before 1.6.1 opens the file-descriptor passed to the pid-1 process before performing the chroot, which allows local users to gain privileges via a symlink attack in an image.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-3627` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

docker.io - 1.6.2~dfsg1-1ubuntu4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: docker.io package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.6.2~dfsg1-1ubuntu4').
